panels.description: Number of Brokers Online
panels.title: Brokers Online

panels.description: Number of active controllers in the cluster. Should be 1.
panels.title: Active Controllers

panels.description: Unclean leader election rate. Should be 0.
panels.title: Unclean Leader Election Rate

panels.description: Also includes the MSK internal topics __amazon_msk_canary, __amazon_msk_canary_state, __consumer_offsets
panels.title: Total Topics

panels.description: Partitions that are online
panels.title: Online Partitions

panels.description: Number of under-replicated partitions (| ISR | < | all replicas |). Should be 0.
panels.title: Under Replicated Partitions

panels.description: Number of partitions that donâ€™t have an active leader and are hence not writable or readable.
panels.title: Offline Partitions Count

panels.description: The average amount of CPU time, per second, over the 5 minutes (in seconds)
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Aggregated incoming and outgoing byte rate across brokers.
BytesInPerSec is the metric that monitors the write throughput of producers into each broker.
BytesOutPerSec is the number of bytes per second sent to clients.
panels.title: Byte Rate Per Second

panels.description: Total messages ingested across brokers
panels.title: Messages In Per Second

panels.description: Number of total vs failed producer requests being to a broker per second.
panels.title: Produce Request Rate

panels.description: Comparing the total vs failed fetch requests made by the client and replicas.
panels.title: Fetch Request Rate

panels.description: The aggregated offset lag for all the partitions in a topic.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_group_ConsumerLagMetrics_Value{ name="SumOffsetLag", topic!="",  topic!~".*source.*", topic!~".*__.*", topic!~".*heartbeat.*"}) by (groupId, topic)

panels.title: Consumer Lag By Topic

panels.description:
The rate of requests for producers, consumers, and followers across brokers.
If RequestsPerSec remains high, then increase the batch size on your producers, consumers, and/or number of brokers.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description:
The average percentage of the time the network processors are idle. 

Recommended value between 0 and 100%, ideally > 0.3 (30%)
panels.title: Network Processor Avg Idle Percent

panels.description:
The average percentage of the time the request handler threads are idle.
Recommended value between 0 and 1 (100%), ideally > 0.3 (30%)
panels.title: Request Handler Avg Idle Percent

panels.description:
Number of errors in responses counted per-request-type, per-error-code.

If network throughput decreases without an increase in error rate, this can indicate the need to scale data consumers up, whereas dropped packets can indicate a hardware issue.
panels.title: Network: ErrorsPerSec

panels.description: Total messages ingested across business topics

targets.expr: sum (kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_OneMinuteRate{name="MessagesInPerSec", topic!="",  topic!~".*source.*", topic!~".*__.*", topic!~".*heartbeat.*"}) without(instance)

panels.title: MessagesInPerSec by Business Topic

panels.description: Aggregated incoming byte rate across brokers by topics.

targets.expr: sum (kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name="BytesInPerSec", topic=~".+", topic!~".*source.*", topic!~".*__.*", topic!~".*heartbeat.*"}) by (topic)

panels.title: Byte In by Business Topic

panels.description: Aggregated outgoing byte rate across brokers by topics.

targets.expr: sum (kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name="BytesOutPerSec", topic=~".+", topic!~".*source.*", topic!~".*__.*", topic!~".*heartbeat.*"}) by (topic)

panels.title: Byte Out by Business Topic

panels.description:
Disk space used in % per broker.
Ref: https://www.robustperception.io/filesystem-metrics-from-the-node-exporter
panels.title: % Disk Space Used by Broker

panels.description: Total available disk space
panels.title: Total Disk Space
